com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.fluent

Interface AbstractObjectTransformer<TX extends AbstractObjectTransformer<TX,V,T,R>,V extends AbstractObjectChecker<V,T,R>,T,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    TX - The type of the extending class itself.
    V - A type of checker produced by this transformer.
    T - The type of the target value of the instance of this interface.
    R - The type of the target value of the checker instance V
    All Superinterfaces:
    Matcher<TX,T,R>, Statement<T>, Transformer<TX,V,T,R>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BooleanTransformer<T>, ComparableNumberTransformer<TX,V,T,N>, DoubleTransformer<T>, FloatTransformer<T>, IntegerTransformer<T>, ListTransformer<T,E>, LongTransformer<T>, ObjectTransformer<T,E>, ShortTransformer<T>, StreamTransformer<T,E>, StringTransformer<T>, ThrowableTransformer<T,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanTransformer.Impl, DoubleTransformer.Impl, Expectations.CustomTransformer, FloatTransformer.Impl, IntegerTransformer.Impl, ListTransformer.Impl, LongTransformer.Impl, ObjectTransformer.Impl, ShortTransformer.Impl, StreamTransformer.Impl, StringTransformer.Impl, ThrowableTransformer.Impl

    public interface AbstractObjectTransformer<TX extends AbstractObjectTransformer<TX,V,T,R>,V extends AbstractObjectChecker<V,T,R>,T,R>
extends Transformer<TX,V,T,R>

      • expectException

        default <O extends Throwable> ThrowableTransformer<T,O> expectException(Class<O> exceptionClass,
                                                                        Function<? super R,?> f)

        Applies f, which is expected to throw an exception object of class exceptionClass, to the target value of this transformer object. In case no exception is thrown, or a different type of exception is thrown, an exception will be thrown. But its type is not specified.

        Type Parameters:
        O - An exception class to be thrown by f.
        Parameters:
        exceptionClass - A class of exception object of the exception to be thrown by f.
        f - A function that is expected to throw an exception object of exceptionClass.
        Returns:
        A ThrowableTransformer instance constructed for the thrown exception by f.
        See Also:
        Functions.expectingException(Class, Function)

      • asObject

        default <E> ObjectTransformer<T,E> asObject()

        Mainly used for internal purposes

        Type Parameters:
        E -
        Returns:
        Another transformer objecct.

      • toObject

        default <E> ObjectTransformer<T,E> toObject(Function<R,E> function)

        Applies a given function to the currently targeted value and returns a new ObjectTransformer whose target value is the returned value from the function.

        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the returned value of the function.
        Parameters:
        function - A function to be applied to the target value.
        Returns:
        A new ObjectTransformer which targets the result of the function.
